com.gemstone.gemfire.modules.session.bootstrap

Class ClientServerCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gemstone.gemfire.modules.session.bootstrap.AbstractCache
      • com.gemstone.gemfire.modules.session.bootstrap.ClientServerCache

  • public class ClientServerCache
extends AbstractCache
    This is a singleton class which maintains configuration properties as well as starting a Client-Server cache.
